channel.title: Welcome to Oracle :) on
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to Oracle :) on

item.title: Day 1
item.description: Today morning was a good morning. Though I wish I woke up a bit earlier, this was a good morning. I went downstairs, met Amey, talked to him for a while.

item.title: Nice to meet you
item.description: I am Naman, I build things. That’s what I do. That’s what I’m always curious about. That’s what’s authentic to me.

item.title: Reccomendations
item.description: Podcasts: Woice with Warikoo There’s just something reassuring about hearing Ankur’s voice everyday in the morning. It fills you up with hope and brightness :) The Stoic Coffee Break Lovely music, lovely voice and lovely topics being talked about.

item.title: Slow Progress
item.description: I was listening to SCB and it talked about how most important things in life come from consistency and not some breakthrough.
